question: Remote Procedure Calls are used ____________
options: ['a) for communication between two processes remotely different from each other on the same system', 'b) for communication between two processes on the same system', 'c) for communication between two processes on separate systems', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) for communication between two processes remotely different from each other on the same system
option2: b) for communication between two processes on the same system
option3: c) for communication between two processes on separate systems

question: To differentiate the many network services a system supports ______ are used
RPC provides a(an) _____ on the client-side, a separate one for each remote procedure
What is stub?
options: ['a) transmits the message to the server where the server side stub receives the message and invokes procedure on the server side', 'b) packs the parameters into a form transmittable over the network', 'c) locates the port on the server', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option1: a) transmits the message to the server where the server side stub receives the message and invokes procedure on the server side
option2: b) packs the parameters into a form transmittable over the network
option3: c) locates the port on the server

question: To resolve the problem of data representation on different systems RPCs define _____________
options: ['a) machine dependent representation of data', 'b) machine representation of data', 'c) machine-independent representation of data', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) machine dependent representation of data

question: What is the full form of RMI?
options: ['a) Remote Memory Installation', 'b) Remote Memory Invocation', 'c) Remote Method Installation', 'd) Remote Method Invocation']

question: The remote method invocation __________
options: ['a) allows a process to invoke memory on a remote object', 'b) allows a thread to invoke a method on a remote object', 'c) allows a thread to invoke memory on a remote object', 'd) allows a process to invoke a method on a remote object']
option1: a) allows a process to invoke memory on a remote object
option2: b) allows a thread to invoke a method on a remote object
option3: c) allows a thread to invoke memory on a remote object
option4: d) allows a process to invoke a method on a remote object

question: A process that is based on IPC mechanism which executes on different systems and can communicate with other processes using message based communication, is called ________
options: ['a) Local Procedure Call', 'b) Inter Process Communication', 'c) Remote Procedure Call', 'd) Remote Machine Invocation']
